headline: How The Investment Story For PPG Industries (PPG) Is Shifting With New Targets And Guidance
summary: PPG Industries’ modeled fair value has been nudged to US$125.30 from US$123.75, a small price target adjustment that still matters if you are watching where analysts think the stock should sit. That subtle move lines up with a research backdrop where some firms are more upbeat and others are more cautious, reflecting different views on execution risk, sector headwinds, and how much is already priced in. As you read on, you will see how to interpret these shifting targets and keep up with the...
